summary: Makes it convenient to create Tone.js time-strings (e.g. "C4")

ports.name: Time
ports.text: The time to be converted to a tone.js-compatible time-format

ports.name: Time Type
ports.text: Either `Note`, `Triplet`, `Measure`, `Second`, `Frequency` or `Tick`.  See [Time](https://github.com/Tonejs/Tone.js/wiki/Time) for more infos.

ports.name: Relative To Now
ports.text: When set the output string will be prefixed by a `+`-character – so the time will be interpreted as «the current time plus whatever expression follows»

ports.name: Tone Time
ports.text: A string representing time, to be used together with another tone.js-op
